channel.title: The 'Stupid Thing' Game
channel.description:
Hello, inspired by the work of the First Version of Runescape in a batch file by LeScape Pk, I made this text based game too.It's something like his version but of course different.
Don't look at the code, it spoils the fun.
[b]Step 1 : [/b]Make a batch file
[b]Step 2 : [/b]Copy this code into it [b]V2[/b] [code]@echo off :startscreen title The stupid thing by 1234 echo Welcome to the very first game made by 1234! echo Choose an option below please. echo 'exit' to exit the game. echo. echo A - View Origin echo B - Start Game echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== A goto gameorigin if %c%== B goto gamestart pause cls :gameorigin title Game Start echo. echo Welcome, to the Stupid Thing by 1234! echo This is a game that does nothing to your computer echo Just something for you to play when you're bored! echo. echo Enter 'B' To return to the main menu. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== B goto startscreen pause :gamestart title Game Origin echo. echo Hello, and welcome to the game. Please select your gender echo with the words 'male' or 'female'. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== male goto gamestart-male if %c%== female goto gamestart-female pause :gamestart-male title Welcome, Male echo. echo. Hello, Male. What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto welcomemale pause :gamestart-female title Welcome, Female echo. echo. Hello, Female, What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto :welcomefemale pause :welcomemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a male of the game, you will fuck with all the girls echo you see while on your journey to get the rare weapon echo called ' The Elephant Humper '. The weapon is an echo extremely powerful weapon which can slay any monster or echo human with one single touch. You're main quest now is to echo get to the Slayer tower and reach the top to get the echo Elephant Humper. echo. echo Good Luck. pause goto gamestart1 :welcomefemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a female of the game, you will avoid all men echo you see because on your journey, they will start trying to echo fuck you with their big slimy dicks.Beware, they are poi- echo sonous as well as very very slimy as mentioned just now. echo I had the case a few years back, and my anus is still echo having minor injury due to anal sex by the men.Although echo that is one case, you need to get the most powerful weapon echo called ' The Elephant Humper '.The weapon is an extremely echo powerful weapon which can slay any monster or human echo with one single touch. You're main quest now is to get echo to the top of the Slayer tower and get the Elephant echo Humper. echo. echo Good luck avoiding those pesky men. pause goto gamestart1 :gamestart1 title Stupid Thing echo. echo You spawn next to a troll, what do you do? echo. echo To talk to the troll, enter 1. echo To slay the troll, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1 if %c%== 2 goto 2 pause :1 title Stupid Thing echo. echo Troll: Hello, and welcome to the slayer tower. echo Please choose an option below echo. echo To slay the troll , enter 1. echo To proceed without doing a thing, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2 if %c%== 2 goto gamestart1 pause :2 title Stupid Thing echo. echo Good Job, You slayed it. echo. set /p c=Proceed?: if %c%== yes goto 1a if %c%== no goto 2 pause :1a title Stupid Thing echo. echo You walk down the path and see an Elvarg echo. echo To Molest Elvarg, press 1. echo To brutaly murder Elvarg, press 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 3 if %c%== 2 goto 2b pause :3 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 3 pause :2b title Stupid Thing echo. echo You successfully killed elvarg. echo. set /p c=Proceed?: if %c%== yes goto 1c if %c%== no goto 2b pause :1c title Stupid Thing echo. echo You see a Lesser Demon echo. echo To kill it, enter 1. echo To run for it, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2c if %c%== 2 goto 1d :2c title Stupid Thing echo. echo YOU: Eat shit lesser demon! echo Lesser : *Sighs*Oh no!!!! goto 1e pause :1d title Oops! echo. echo You have been killed. echo. echo To restart, enter 1. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto gamestart if %c%== 2 goto gamestart pause :1e title Stupid Thing echo. echo You see the elephant humper echo But it was blocked by Mod Taharok! pause goto 1g :1g title Stupid Thing echo. echo Mod taharok has sighted you echo. echo To kill him, enter 1. echo To beg him to give you the elephant humper, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2d if %c%== 2 goto 3b pause :3b title Oops! echo. echo You got slapped! pause goto gamestart :2d title Stupid Thing echo. echo He still fights back! pause goto 1h :1h title Stupid Thing echo. echo You take out a dragon battleaxe and use the special echo attack. echo. echo To keep shouting for strength, enter 1. echo To use your other hand and poke him with echo a halberd, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2e if %c%== 2 goto 1i pause :1i title Stupid Thing echo. echo You successfully slayed him. echo. echo To take the elephant humper, enter 1. echo To sit there and do nothing, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto lj if %c%== 2 goto 2e pause :2e title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :lj title Stupid Thing echo. echo You Take the Elephant Humper and go back to echo the town as a hero when suddenly a red faced echo clown popped out from a secluded corner and echo started molesting you for no reason..When echo you suddenly dropped the Elephant Humper, echo The clown took it so you did the same on him echo and so he dropped the Elephant Humper, and echo it back. echo. echo To give it to the town mayor, enter 1. echo To tell yourself you want to die, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1k if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :1k title Oh no.. echo. echo Congratulations! You've completed the long-waited-for-a-hero quest! echo Therefore you have been crowned a hero. echo 25 years later, you passed away with an unknown disease echo so then the new towns mayor made a monument echo of you for retrieving the long lost Elephant Humper. echo The Monument description said : echo In honour of the guy who did not hump anyone before, echo (Your Name) echo. echo Your soul suddenly woke up from the coffin and saw those words, echo only wanting to take back the Elephant Humper and regretted echo for helping those pesky pieces of shit people. pause cls goto 5j :5j title Retrieve the sword! echo Somewhere you found a time scooter.It could only be touched echo by souls of dead heroes.You are one of them.You take the scooter, echo Go back 25 years and became alive again.The first thing you echo did was make medicine for yourself so you wouldn't die, echo and then the second thing was steal the Elephant Humper echo from the town again. echo. echo You Thought : 'Hey, this isn't a bad idea after all.'.As you see echo in cartoons, Some good people turn evil.You became evil. echo Two choices are in your hands.You echo. echo Stay evil and throw the E.H. Far Far away, Enter 1 echo Fight with yourself and try to become good again, Enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 9z if %c%== 2 goto 6s pause cls :9z title Oh no.. echo You stay evil..Wearing the cape with most evil..The obsidian cape. echo You suddenly don't feel right..and you feel guilty about echo throwing the E.H. far away..So you cried and cried and echo finally made up your mind to become good again. pause cls goto 6s :6s title A New Life echo You start fighting with yourself and try to become a good echo person again..and successfully, you have opened echo hell's door and kicked satan into it...Very good job, echo you thought.Indeed it is, and the music goes on and on... echo Just 1 Year later, the towns mayor demolished the current echo monument of you with those silly words..and did the echo same thing again but replaced the words with echo ' In honour of the man who retrieved the E.H. ' echo Hm.You felt very happy.And then, the mayor decided echo to celebrate with a party as a 'please forgive me' echo representation.And so, you echo. echo Forgive him , Enter 1 echo Demand 50k Coins then forgive him , Enter 2 echo. echo The answers above will be the last part of the game, echo and determine what kind of person you are. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 7h if %c%== 2 goto 5o pause cls :7h title Results echo You are a good person.Yes, you did not demand for echo more gold, instead let him save the money for echo supplies to the town. echo Thank you very much for playing this game. pause :5o title Results echo You fucking bum, don't be so greedy, work up echo your own money is what i have to say, echo but thanks for playing this game. pause[/code]
[b]V1[/b] [code]@echo off :startscreen title The stupid thing by 1234 echo Welcome to the very first game made by 1234! echo Choose an option below please. echo 'exit' to exit the game. echo. echo A - Start the game. echo B - View the game origin. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== A goto gameorigin if %c%== B goto gamestart pause cls :gameorigin title Game Start echo. echo Welcome, to the Stupid Thing by 1234! echo This is a game that does nothing to your computer echo Just something for you to play when you're bored! echo. echo Enter 'B' To return to the main menu. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== B goto startscreen pause :gamestart title Game Origin echo. echo Hello, and welcome to the game. Please select your gender echo with the words 'male' or 'female'. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== male goto gamestart-male if %c%== female goto gamestart-female pause :gamestart-male title Welcome, Male echo. echo. Hello, Male. What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto welcomemale pause :gamestart-female title Welcome, Female echo. echo. Hello, Female, What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto :welcomefemale pause :welcomemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a male of the game, you will fuck with all the girls echo you see while on your journey to get the rare weapon echo called ' The Elephant Humper '. The weapon is an echo extremely powerful weapon which can slay any monster or echo human with one single touch. You're main quest now is to echo get to the Slayer tower and reach the top to get the echo Elephant Humper. echo. echo Good Luck. pause goto gamestart1 :welcomefemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a female of the game, you will avoid all men echo you see because on your journey, they will start trying to echo fuck you with their big slimy dicks.Beware, they are poi- echo sonous as well as very very slimy as mentioned just now. echo I had the case a few years back, and my anus is still echo having minor injury due to anal sex by the men.Although echo that is one case, you need to get the most powerful weapon echo called ' The Elephant Humper '.The weapon is an extremely echo powerful weapon which can slay any monster or human echo with one single touch. You're main quest now is to get echo to the top of the Slayer tower and get the Elephant echo Humper. echo. echo Good luck avoiding those pesky men. pause goto gamestart1 :gamestart1 title Stupid Thing echo. echo You spawn next to a troll, what do you do? echo. echo To talk to the troll, enter 1. echo To slay the troll, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1 if %c%== 2 goto 2 pause :1 title Stupid Thing echo. echo Troll: Hello, and welcome to the slayer tower. echo Please choose an option below echo. echo To slay the troll , enter 1. echo To proceed without doing a thing, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2 if %c%== 2 goto gamestart1 pause :2 title Stupid Thing echo. echo Good Job, You slayed it. echo. set /p c=Proceed?: if %c%== yes goto 1a if %c%== no goto 2 pause :1a title Stupid Thing echo. echo You walk down the path and see an Elvarg echo. echo To Molest Elvarg, press 1. echo To brutaly murder Elvarg, press 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 3 if %c%== 2 goto 2b pause :3 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 3 pause :2b title Stupid Thing echo. echo You successfully killed elvarg. echo. set /p c=Proceed?: if %c%== yes goto 1c if %c%== no goto 2b pause :1c title Stupid Thing echo. echo You see a Lesser Demon echo. echo To kill it, enter 1. echo To run for it, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2c if %c%== 2 goto 1d :2c title Stupid Thing echo. echo YOU: Eat shit lesser demon! echo Lesser : *Sighs*Oh no!!!! goto 1e pause :1d title Oops! echo. echo You have been killed. echo. echo To restart, enter 1. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto gamestart if %c%== 2 goto gamestart pause :1e title Stupid Thing echo. echo You see the elephant humper echo But it was blocked by Mod Taharok! pause goto 1g :1g title Stupid Thing echo. echo Mod taharok has sighted you echo. echo To kill him, enter 1. echo To beg him to give you the elephant humper, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2d if %c%== 2 goto 3b pause :3b title Oops! echo. echo You got slapped! pause goto gamestart :2d title Stupid Thing echo. echo He still fights back! pause goto 1h :1h title Stupid Thing echo. echo You take out a dragon battleaxe and use the special echo attack. echo. echo To keep shouting for strength, enter 1. echo To use your other hand and poke him with echo a halberd, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2e if %c%== 2 goto 1i pause :1i title Stupid Thing echo. echo You successfully slayed him. echo. echo To take the elephant humper, enter 1. echo To sit there and do nothing, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto lj if %c%== 2 goto 2e pause :2e title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :lj title Stupid Thing echo. echo You Take the Elephant Humper and go back to echo the town as a hero when suddenly a red faced echo clown popped out from a secluded corner and echo started molesting you for no reason..When echo you suddenly dropped the Elephant Humper, echo The clown took it so you did the same on him echo and so he dropped the Elephant Humper, and echo it back. echo. echo To give it to the town mayor, enter 1. echo To tell yourself you want to die, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1k if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :1k title Congratulations! echo. echo Congratulations! You've completed the long-waited-for-a-hero quest! echo Therefore you have been crowned a hero. echo 25 years later, you passed away with an unknown disease echo so then the new towns mayor made a monument echo of you for retrieving the long lost Elephant Humper. echo The Monument description said : echo In honour of the guy who did not hump anyone before, echo (Your Name) echo. echo Your soul suddenly woke up from the coffin and saw those words, echo only wanting to take back the Elephant Humper and regretted echo for helping those pesky pieces of shit people. pause[/code]
and Start playing!
Have fun, i made this out of pure boredom =.=
Credits to LeScape Pk 90% and 10% to me for some editing..
[b]Look at the credits before you guys fucking start to flame[/b]

item.title: The 'Stupid Thing' Game
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

YOU do realise this is leached and change the name.

PROOF:

@echo off :startscreen title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo Welcome to the very first RuneScape! By Le Ltd. Please select echo an option below, and remember; at any time you may type echo 'exit' to exit the game. echo. echo A - Start the game. echo B - View the game origin. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== A goto gamestart if %c%== B goto gameorigin pause cls :gameorigin title Game Origin echo. echo Welcome, to the very first ever RuneScape! By Le Ltd echo (little to do(so we made this)). This is a text based game, which was echo the very first version of RuneScape! After much developement, Le sold the echo idea to Jagex Ltd because it was getting nowhere, but after Le saw what echo Jagex Ltd had done with the game, he was shocked. Jagex had developed an echo entire new game with the idea, RuneScape Classic! Le was shocked echo by the huge success, and was mad for selling the idea; but once the echo RuneScape we all Know and love came out, RuneScape 2, Le was furious with echo himself for selling the first version of RuneScape developed by Le Ltd. echo Le had put so much work into it, only to find it could have been a huge echo success with a little developement, and he could have been making millions echo of dollars with all the the $5 paying addicts. Le was so furious, that echo he set off to overcome Jagex Ltd and make a new RuneScape, a better echo RuneScape, but since they googled all the answers on moparscape echo quiz, this is all Le and Le Ltd could come up with. echo. echo Enter 'B' To return to the main menu. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== B goto startscreen pause :gamestart title Game Start echo. echo Hello, and welcome to the world of RuneScape. Please select a gender echo with the words 'male' or 'female'. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== male goto gamestart-male if %c%== female goto gamestart-female pause :gamestart-male title Welcome, Male echo. echo. Hello, Male. What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto welcomemale pause :gamestart-female title Welcome, Female echo. echo. Hello, Female, What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto :welcomefemale pause :welcomemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a male of RuneScape, your main goal is to snag the rare echo partyhat, and if your really lucky, the female. Females are scarce, echo 10 percent of RuneScape is a female, and 90 percent of that 10 percent echo is a male pretending to be a female, so watch out. Also, females can echo be very dangerous, known to have hit 90's with the lengendary bitch echo slap. They can also suck you dry quicker than a noob in Lumbridge echo when you're wearing full dragon. Your secondary goals are to avoid said echo noobs, as they will stick to you like a bad germ, and to become the echo strongest in the game, making wise choices and actually playing the game. echo Good luck. pause goto gamestart1 :welcomefemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a female of RuneScape, your main goal is to dig as much echo gold as you can from the pockets of males. Males will be warned of females, echo and their sometimes lack of the female parts. So be careful, they may be echo suspicious of you. Your secondary goals are to look as "prettifull" and echo "seksi" as you possibly can, and buy items for their looks instead echo of their bonuses. Good luck. pause goto gamestart1 :gamestart1 title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You spawn next to a guide, what do you do? echo. echo To talk to the man, enter 1. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1 if %c%== 2 goto 2 pause :1 title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo MAN: Hello, and welcome to RuneScape, please follow the road echo down and speak with the survival expert. echo. echo To follow the road, enter 1. echo To talk to the man, enter 2. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1a if %c%== 2 goto 2a if %c%== 3 goto 3 pause :2 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 2 pause :1a title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You walk down the path and see the lady echo. echo To talk to the lady, press 1. echo To brutaly murder the lady, press 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1b if %c%== 2 goto 2b pause :2a title The Very First RuneScape - By Le LTd. echo. echo MAN: Hello, and welcome to RuneScape, please follow the road echo down and speak with the survival expert. echo. echo To follow the road, enter 1. echo To talk to the man, enter 2. echo To sit there and try to move with the arrows, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1a if %c%== 2 goto 2a if %c%== 3 goto 3 pause :3 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 3 pause :1b title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo LADY: Here, take this fishing net and try to catch some echo shrimp from that fishing spot over there. echo. echo To go to the fishing spots and try to fish, enter 1. echo To say "Fuck no bitch", enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1c if %c%== 2 goto 2c pause :2b title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Retry?: if %c%== yes goto 2a if %c%== no goto 2b pause :1c title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You fish for shrimp...you catch one! echo. echo To fish for more shrimp, enter 1. echo To talk to the lady again, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1c if %c%== 2 goto 1f :2c title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo YOU: Fuck no bitch, you go fish them. echo LADY: Oooooh Mr. Leeeee. goto 1d pause :1d title Oops! echo. echo You have been banned. echo. echo To restart, enter 1. echo To argue the ban, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto gamestart if %c%== 2 goto 1e pause :1f title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo LADY: Here's a tinderbox and an axe, chop down the tree and echo then try to cook the fish. echo. echo To cut down a tree, enter 1. echo To fish for more shrimp, enter 2. echo To talk say "Fuck no bitch", enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1g if %c%== 2 goto 1c if %c%== 3 goto 2c pause :1e title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You sent a message to Le. Success! Ban lifted. pause goto 1b :1g title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You cut logs from the tree. echo. echo To light the logs on fire with the tinderbox, enter 1. echo To throw the stuff in the river for no apparent reason, enter 2. echo To chop your head off with frustration of this piece of shit game, enter 3. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1h if %c%== 2 goto 2d if %c%== 3 goto 3b pause :3b title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :2d title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo Well that did no good? Go talk to the lady again. pause goto 1f :1h title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You light the logs on fire. echo. echo To cook the shrimp on the fire, enter 1. echo To cook yourself on the fire enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1i if %c%== 2 goto 2e pause :1i title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo You cook the shrimp. echo. echo To talk to the lady, enter 1. echo To test the theory "fire is hot", enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto lj if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2e title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :lj title The Very First RuneScape - By Le Ltd. echo. echo Lady: Congratulations, you may now move on. echo. echo To move on down the road, enter 1. echo To tell the lady you love her and want to stay, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1k if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :1k title Congratulations! echo. echo Congratulations! You've beaten The Very First RuneScape V1 - more versions to come! pause

Read full topic

item.title: The 'Stupid Thing' Game
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Hello,
inspired by the work of the First Version of Runescape in a batch file by LeScape Pk,
I made this text based game too.It’s something like his version but of course different.

Don’t look at the code, it spoils the fun.

Step 1 : Make a batch file

Step 2 : Copy this code into it
V2

@echo off :startscreen title The stupid thing by 1234 echo Welcome to the very first game made by 1234! echo Choose an option below please. echo 'exit' to exit the game. echo. echo A - View Origin echo B - Start Game echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== A goto gameorigin if %c%== B goto gamestart pause cls :gameorigin title Game Start echo. echo Welcome, to the Stupid Thing by 1234! echo This is a game that does nothing to your computer echo Just something for you to play when you're bored! echo. echo Enter 'B' To return to the main menu. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== B goto startscreen pause :gamestart title Game Origin echo. echo Hello, and welcome to the game. Please select your gender echo with the words 'male' or 'female'. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== male goto gamestart-male if %c%== female goto gamestart-female pause :gamestart-male title Welcome, Male echo. echo. Hello, Male. What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto welcomemale pause :gamestart-female title Welcome, Female echo. echo. Hello, Female, What may I call you? echo. set /p c=Name?: goto :welcomefemale pause :welcomemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a male of the game, you will fuck with all the girls echo you see while on your journey to get the rare weapon echo called ' The Elephant Humper '. The weapon is an echo extremely powerful weapon which can slay any monster or echo human with one single touch. You're main quest now is to echo get to the Slayer tower and reach the top to get the echo Elephant Humper. echo. echo Good Luck. pause goto gamestart1 :welcomefemale title Welcome echo. echo Welcome, as a female of the game, you will avoid all men echo you see because on your journey, they will start trying to echo fuck you with their big slimy dicks.Beware, they are poi- echo sonous as well as very very slimy as mentioned just now. echo I had the case a few years back, and my anus is still echo having minor injury due to anal sex by the men.Although echo that is one case, you need to get the most powerful weapon echo called ' The Elephant Humper '.The weapon is an extremely echo powerful weapon which can slay any monster or human echo with one single touch. You're main quest now is to get echo to the top of the Slayer tower and get the Elephant echo Humper. echo. echo Good luck avoiding those pesky men. pause goto gamestart1 :gamestart1 title Stupid Thing echo. echo You spawn next to a troll, what do you do? echo. echo To talk to the troll, enter 1. echo To slay the troll, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1 if %c%== 2 goto 2 pause :1 title Stupid Thing echo. echo Troll: Hello, and welcome to the slayer tower. echo Please choose an option below echo. echo To slay the troll , enter 1. echo To proceed without doing a thing, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2 if %c%== 2 goto gamestart1 pause :2 title Stupid Thing echo. echo Good Job, You slayed it. echo. set /p c=Proceed?: if %c%== yes goto 1a if %c%== no goto 2 pause :1a title Stupid Thing echo. echo You walk down the path and see an Elvarg echo. echo To Molest Elvarg, press 1. echo To brutaly murder Elvarg, press 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 3 if %c%== 2 goto 2b pause :3 title Oops! echo. echo GRRR, you messed up. echo. set /p c=Restart?: if %c%== yes goto gamestart1 if %c%== no goto 3 pause :2b title Stupid Thing echo. echo You successfully killed elvarg. echo. set /p c=Proceed?: if %c%== yes goto 1c if %c%== no goto 2b pause :1c title Stupid Thing echo. echo You see a Lesser Demon echo. echo To kill it, enter 1. echo To run for it, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2c if %c%== 2 goto 1d :2c title Stupid Thing echo. echo YOU: Eat shit lesser demon! echo Lesser : *Sighs*Oh no!!!! goto 1e pause :1d title Oops! echo. echo You have been killed. echo. echo To restart, enter 1. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto gamestart if %c%== 2 goto gamestart pause :1e title Stupid Thing echo. echo You see the elephant humper echo But it was blocked by Mod Taharok! pause goto 1g :1g title Stupid Thing echo. echo Mod taharok has sighted you echo. echo To kill him, enter 1. echo To beg him to give you the elephant humper, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2d if %c%== 2 goto 3b pause :3b title Oops! echo. echo You got slapped! pause goto gamestart :2d title Stupid Thing echo. echo He still fights back! pause goto 1h :1h title Stupid Thing echo. echo You take out a dragon battleaxe and use the special echo attack. echo. echo To keep shouting for strength, enter 1. echo To use your other hand and poke him with echo a halberd, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 2e if %c%== 2 goto 1i pause :1i title Stupid Thing echo. echo You successfully slayed him. echo. echo To take the elephant humper, enter 1. echo To sit there and do nothing, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto lj if %c%== 2 goto 2e pause :2e title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :lj title Stupid Thing echo. echo You Take the Elephant Humper and go back to echo the town as a hero when suddenly a red faced echo clown popped out from a secluded corner and echo started molesting you for no reason..When echo you suddenly dropped the Elephant Humper, echo The clown took it so you did the same on him echo and so he dropped the Elephant Humper, and echo it back. echo. echo To give it to the town mayor, enter 1. echo To tell yourself you want to die, enter 2. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 1k if %c%== 2 goto 2f pause :2f title Oops! echo. echo You died! pause goto gamestart :1k title Oh no.. echo. echo Congratulations! You've completed the long-waited-for-a-hero quest! echo Therefore you have been crowned a hero. echo 25 years later, you passed away with an unknown disease echo so then the new towns mayor made a monument echo of you for retrieving the long lost Elephant Humper. echo The Monument description said : echo In honour of the guy who did not hump anyone before, echo (Your Name) echo. echo Your soul suddenly woke up from the coffin and saw those words, echo only wanting to take back the Elephant Humper and regretted echo for helping those pesky pieces of shit people. pause cls goto 5j :5j title Retrieve the sword! echo Somewhere you found a time scooter.It could only be touched echo by souls of dead heroes.You are one of them.You take the scooter, echo Go back 25 years and became alive again.The first thing you echo did was make medicine for yourself so you wouldn't die, echo and then the second thing was steal the Elephant Humper echo from the town again. echo. echo You Thought : 'Hey, this isn't a bad idea after all.'.As you see echo in cartoons, Some good people turn evil.You became evil. echo Two choices are in your hands.You echo. echo Stay evil and throw the E.H. Far Far away, Enter 1 echo Fight with yourself and try to become good again, Enter 2 echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 9z if %c%== 2 goto 6s pause cls :9z title Oh no.. echo You stay evil..Wearing the cape with most evil..The obsidian cape. echo You suddenly don't feel right..and you feel guilty about echo throwing the E.H. far away..So you cried and cried and echo finally made up your mind to become good again. pause cls goto 6s :6s title A New Life echo You start fighting with yourself and try to become a good echo person again..and successfully, you have opened echo hell's door and kicked satan into it...Very good job, echo you thought.Indeed it is, and the music goes on and on... echo Just 1 Year later, the towns mayor demolished the current echo monument of you with those silly words..and did the echo same thing again but replaced the words with echo ' In honour of the man who retrieved the E.H. ' echo Hm.You felt very happy.And then, the mayor decided echo to celebrate with a party as a 'please forgive me' echo representation.And so, you echo. echo Forgive him , Enter 1 echo Demand 50k Coins then forgive him , Enter 2 echo. echo The answers above will be the last part of the game, echo and determine what kind of person you are. echo. set /p c=Choice?: if %c%== 1 goto 7h if %c%== 2 goto 5o pause cls :7h title Results echo You are a good person.Yes, you did not demand for echo more gold, instead let him save the money for echo supplies to the town. echo Thank you very much for playing this game. pause :5o title Results echo You fucking bum, don't be so greedy, work up echo your own money is what i have to say, echo but thanks for playing this game. pause

V1
